page_content: The page discusses the updated educational strategy for the Canton of Bern for the year 2009.
The page informs about increased traffic due to concerts in Bern and recommends using public transportation.
The page discusses traffic disruptions in the Wankdorf area due to a concert by Andreas Gabalier and recommends using public transportation.
The page reports a car collision in Krauchthal that resulted in one person being injured and traffic disruptions.
The page provides information about traffic disruptions due to the 30th Berner Fasnacht festival.
